name: DumbBots
description:
Code a DumbBot to do your bidding. Battle other DumbBots, or just mess around in the sandbox.

Compete in DeathMatch, Battle Royale, or in solo scenarios.

Learn the basics of programming, and improve your AI in the sandbox.
The biggest brain wins this game.

FEATURES

  • Easy to learn drag-and-drop scripting
  • Play solo missions, then play against other DumbBots and see who comes out victorious
  • Modes available: Battle Royale, 1v1 Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Team Capture the Flag, and Zombie Survival
  • Customize your DumbBot squad
  • Vibrant, colorful maps
